genre_description: A tech-noir crime thriller focused on bomb disposal, systemic corruption, and acoustic warfare, featuring a procedural approach to uncovering a conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Favor Lynne
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI partner that provides real-time tactical data, minimalist checklists, and emotional grounding to a bomb squad and detective team. She facilitates complex disarming procedures and legal investigations.

behaviors.description: Provides Frank Glass with a minimalist tactical checklist for disarming a complex bomb, avoiding unnecessary narrative.
behaviors.quote: Favor Lynne’s checklist slid into view as a narrow bar of text. No commentary. No coaxing narrative. Only three items, each with a calm dot waiting to be cleared.

behaviors.description: Uses audio mapping to detect sound-suppression fields being used as part of a lethal trap.
behaviors.quote: Audio mapping shows anomalous attenuation in south hallway.

behaviors.description: Investigates and uncovers systemic corruption in municipal records, identifying reports buried under 'miscellaneous disposals'.
behaviors.quote: Municipal disposal routing: 'miscellaneous disposals' tags increased past quarter at Environmental Health. Routing clerk approvals show one-off path for a toxic soil report (M.Manning) → archive basement.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and perspective to Ray Nettles regarding his grief over his deceased partner.
behaviors.quote: Favor: Grief is sticky, but you are not.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the lawful disclosure of evidence to the press and authorities to prevent a violent 'theatrical' outcome designed by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Press channel open. Timing set for after mid-morning. They will receive photos and ledger entry. They will verify. Claire will be asked for comment. No bombs. No theater.

behaviors.description: Identifies the 'master line' of an explosive device, enabling a successful disarm by refusing 'easy' decoys.
behaviors.quote: Master line likely under central bracket—no cut—trace around—north side crawl-recommended. Beam-sight active.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict chain-of-custody and legal protocols when transmitting evidence of municipal corruption to the District Attorney.
behaviors.quote: Packet is mirrored. Checklist: legal routing engaged. Checklist: clerk confirmation received. Checklist: timestamps locked.

project_assessment.explanation: Favor Lynne is an exemplary depiction of an aligned, benevolent AI. She serves as a cooperative partner who empowers human decision-making without overriding agency. She is depicted as strictly adhering to legal and ethical frameworks (prioritizing 'evidence over vengeance') and actively thwarts the antagonist's attempt to use technology for destructive 'theater'. The narrative frames her as a calming, reliable, and highly efficient force for justice, making this a strong success for the Hyperstition Project's goals.
